title: 神秘时代灵气节点消失
author: SillyHair
txt_content: 今天用地狱炉烧着烧着就发现扔进去的一组铁没出来过，带上眼睛一看发现灵气消失了，如何破……有没有办法重新生成{:10_527:}

replies.author: gba1992pk
replies.txt_content:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/to ... 5c-updated-2152013/

FAQ里第二个问题就是提到灵气节点消失的问题，作者有一个方法可以重新生成节点，修改配置文件
……因为我的服务器也消失了就稍微弄了一下

以服务器为例，因为我是已经生成了世界然后节点突然消失了
找到服务器的这个\server\config\Thaumcraft.cfg←这个文件用记事本打开

拉到最下面会看到这部分：

####################
# world_regeneration
#===================
# If a chunk is encountered that skipped TC worldgen, then the game will attempt to regenerate certain world features if they are set to true. CAUTION: Best used for worlds created before you added this mod, and only if you know what you are doing. Backups are advised.
####################

world_regeneration {
    B:amber_ore=false
    B:aura_nodes=true  ←这里本来是false我修改成true了
    B:cinnibar_ore=false
    B:infused_stone=false

    # This key is used to keep track of which chunk have been generated/regenerated. Changing it will cause the regeneration code to run again, so only change it if you want it to happen. Useful to regen only one world feature at a time.
    S:regen_key=true  ←这里也修改了一下
    B:structures=false
    B:trees=false
}

当然配置文件什么的我是一窍不通啦……
不过自己试着修改了之后重新跑服务器就有新的魔力节点了……

不知道能不能解决楼主的问题呢_(:з」∠)_
